message:
報告報告 
剛剛有一位媽媽過來青島東路 說她是從美國回來的 

目前在美國有提出請願 如下方連結內容 希望我們幫忙宣傳 

目前已給他g0v名片 讓她可以給一份完整的文件給我們
（這是她的堅持XD）

請問我們現在要怎麼做？

這是她的email: minniew77@yahoo.com

http://www.taiwanus.net/news/press/2014/201403241209471278.htm

https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/stop-dictatorship-taiwan-governing-authority/N7QZJ1cB
story: Dustin Wu shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: President Ma violated the democratic due process system and betrayed Taiwan people. He promised to sign the service trade pact with China without Taiwan legislative and people’s approval just for him to earn the entry ticket of meeting with China President Xi. He executed the governing violence beat...
name: 白宮請願：制止台灣統治當局的獨裁血腥暴力
caption: taiwanus.net
